game
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The class that models a Lasers and Mirrors game. Implementation of the model in the MVC architecture. This class handles the business logic.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Game

public Game(int boardHeight,
            int boardWidth,
            java.util.List<Pair<Tile,Position>> tiles)
     throws InvalidBoardSizeException
Creates a new game with a board of the dimensions given and a set of initial tiles. Does not populate the board with the tiles to enable the setup of an observer to track board changes

boardHeight -
boardWidth -
